channel.title: ApocoScape Client V1.0
channel.description:
[size=15pt]Hello, my name is Sapianoid, This is my FIRST completed client! I am Working on better versions and adding custom items. so if anybody has any ideas, please tell me.
critisism is good so i know what to fix[/size]
[size=12pt]I USED GALKONS CLIENT BASE!!! SO DONT TELL ME I LEECHED!!![/size]
[size=14pt][b]Client Main Screen : [/b][/size] [IMG]http://i605.photobucket.com/albums/tt136/Sapianoid/Untitled.jpg[/img] [size=14pt][b]Client After Login : [/b][/size] [IMG]http://i605.photobucket.com/albums/tt136/Sapianoid/asd-1.jpg[/img] I know it sais Devils-Scape, Its Because Im Making A Server From That Server, I have Rights Due To The Server Is My Best Friends....
[size=12pt]I know its not great, its my first Client so PLEASE say if u Downloaded OR LOOKED, and leeve Feedback, PLEASE![/size]
Download : [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zundxwyaeyg]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zundxwyaeyg[/url]

You didn’t do anything. You changed a background on the client. good job. Needs more pictures. Just looks like a leach
[/quote]Coming from the guy with 10 rep?[/quote]
Rep doesn’t mean shit, sooner you learn that, the better.
